query: SELECT e.employee_id, e.employee_name, d.department_name FROM Employee e RIGHT JOIN (SELECT * FROM Department WHERE department_name = 'HR') d ON e.department_id = d.department_id;

query: SELECT d.department_id, d.department_name, COUNT(e.employee_id) AS total_employees FROM Department d FULL OUTER JOIN Employee e ON d.department_id = e.department_id GROUP BY d.department_id, d.department_name;
query_optimized: SELECT d.department_id, d.department_name, COUNT(e.employee_id) AS total_employees FROM Department d FULL OUTER JOIN Employee e ON d.department_id = e.department_id INDEX(d.department_id) GROUP BY d.department_id, d.department_name;
